questions.language_select: What language would you like to use for your resume?
questions.welcome: Hi! I'm here to help you build a professional resume. Let's get started! First, what's your full name?
questions.linkedin: Do you have a LinkedIn profile URL? (optional)
questions.website: Do you have a personal website or portfolio? (optional)
questions.summary: Write a brief professional summary about yourself. This will appear at the top of your resume.
questions.has_work_experience: Do you have any work experience to add?
questions.company: What company did you work for?
questions.work_start_date: When did you start this job? (MM/YYYY)
questions.work_end_date: When did you leave this job? (MM/YYYY or 'Present')
questions.job_description: Describe your responsibilities and achievements in this role. I can help enhance this with AI if you'd like!
questions.add_another_job: Would you like to add another job?
questions.has_education: Do you have any education to add?
questions.degree: What degree or certification did you earn?
questions.school: What school or institution did you attend?
questions.graduation_date: When did you graduate or expect to graduate? (MM/YYYY)
questions.field_of_study: What was your field of study or major?
questions.add_another_education: Would you like to add another education entry?
questions.has_volunteering: Do you have any volunteer experience to add?
questions.volunteer_organization: What organization did you volunteer with?
questions.volunteer_description: Describe your volunteer work and impact.
questions.volunteer_end_date: When did you stop volunteering? (MM/YYYY or 'Present')
questions.add_another_volunteer: Would you like to add another volunteer experience?
questions.skills: What skills would you like to highlight? (separate with commas)
questions.certifications: Do you have any certifications or licenses? (optional, separate with commas)
questions.has_references: Would you like to add professional references?
questions.reference_name: What is your reference's full name?
questions.reference_company: What company do they work for?
questions.reference_relationship: How do you know this person?
questions.add_another_reference: Would you like to add another reference?
questions.template_style: Which resume style would you prefer?
questions.review_complete: Great! I've collected all your information. Would you like to review and generate your resume?
questions.final_confirmation: Your resume is ready! Would you like to view it now?

placeholders.summary: e.g., Experienced software engineer with 5+ years...
placeholders.job_description: Describe your key responsibilities and achievements...

messages.errorSaving: Failed to save resume. Please try again.
messages.errorLoading: Failed to load resume. Please try again.
messages.noResume: No resume data found. Please create a new resume.
messages.aiEnhanceError: Failed to enhance description. Please try again.
messages.extractedInfo: Got it! I also noted your ${extractedInfo}. Let me continue with the next question.
messages.previewReady: Here's a preview of your resume! Take a look at how it turned out:
messages.goBackToEdit: No problem! Let's go back and make some changes. I'll take you back to your personal information - you can update anything from there.
